title: [Large-Scale] Higher Education Strategic Planning Design and Execution Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of organizational management and educational policy
context.additional_context: Long-term VR simulation-based program for vocational language institutions to enhance strategic planning skills of practitioners in limited-technology environments with smartphone-centered interactions

learning_goals: They can explain the strategic planning process of higher education institutions in five stages: diagnosis, goal-setting, strategy development, implementation, and evaluation.
They can derive SWOT-based strategic directions through environmental analysis of a virtual university in a simulation setting.
They can design three or more actionable educational programs through team projects and receive evaluations in a VR environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
